# Question

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.

```julia
using Base.Threads

function pig_latinify(str::String)::String
    vowels = Set(['a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u'])
    if first(str) in vowels
        return str * "ay"
    else
        return str[2:end] * string(str[1]) * "ay"
    end
end

function pig_latin_transformer(strings::Vector{String})::Vector{String}
    transformed = Vector{String}(undef, length(strings))
    @sync @distributed for i in 1:length(strings)
        transformed[i] = pig_latinify(strings[i])
    end
    return transformed
end
```

### Execution Results

```plaintext
**Error Detected:** LoadError("none", 17, UndefVarError(Symbol("@distributed")))
```

```julia
using Distributed
using Base.Threads
using Test

function pig_latinify(str::String)::String
    vowels = Set(['a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u'])
    if first(str) in vowels
        return str * "ay"
    else
        return str[2:end] * string(str[1]) * "ay"
    end
end

function pig_latin_transformer(strings::Vector{String})::Vector{String}
    transformed = Vector{String}(undef, length(strings))
    @sync @distributed for i in 1:length(strings)
        transformed[i] = pig_latinify(strings[i])
    end
    return transformed
end

@testset begin
    @test pig_latin_transformer(["hello", "world"]) == ["ellohay", "orldway"]
    @test pig_latin_transformer(["apple", "banana"]) == ["appleay", "ananabay"]
end
```

```julia
function pig_latinify(str::String)::String
    vowels = Set(['a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u'])
    if first(str) in vowels
        return str * "ay"
    else
        return str[2:end] * string(str[1]) * "ay"

function pig_latin_transformer(strings::Vector{String})::Vector{String}

@testset begin
```

```julia
using Distributed
using Base.Threads
using Test

function pig_latinify(str::String)::String
    vowels = Set(['a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u'])
    if first(str) in vowels
        return str * "ay"
    else
        return str[findfirst(isequal('a'), str):end] * str[1:findfirst(isequal('a'), str)-1] * "ay"
    end
end

function pig_latin_transformer(strings::Vector{String})::Vector{String}
    transformed = Vector{String}(undef, length(strings))
    @sync @distributed for i in 1:length(strings)
        transformed[i] = pig_latinify(strings[i])
    end
    return transformed
end

@testset begin
    @test pig_latin_transformer(["hello", "world"]) == ["ellohay", "orldway"]
    @test pig_latin_transformer(["apple", "banana"]) == ["appleay", "ananabay"]
    @test pig_latin_transformer(["programming", "language"]) == ["ogrammingpray", "anguagelay"]
end
```

```julia
using Distributed
using Base.Threads
using Test

function pig_latinify(str::String)::String
    vowels = Set(['a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u'])
    if first(str) in vowels
        return str * "ay"
    else
        idx = findfirst(isequal('a'), str)
        if idx === nothing
            return str * "ay"
        else
            return str[idx:end] * str[1:idx-1] * "ay"
        end
    end
end

function pig_latin_transformer(strings::Vector{String})::Vector{String}
    transformed = Vector{String}(undef, length(strings))
    @sync @distributed for i in 1:length(strings)
        transformed[i] = pig_latinify(strings[i])
    end
    return transformed
end

@testset begin
    @test pig_latin_transformer(["hello", "world"]) == ["ellohay", "orldway"]
    @test pig_latin_transformer(["apple", "banana"]) == ["appleay", "ananabay"]
    @test pig_latin_transformer(["programming", "language"]) == ["ogrammingpray", "anguagelay"]
end
```
